## How To Test
1. `npm install`
2. If data affected: `npm run scrape`
3. `npm run dev` (or `npm run build && npm run preview`)
4. Navigate to ... and verify ...

## Checklist
- [ ] Changes are scoped and documented
- [ ] No manual edits to `dist/`
- [ ] Ran `npm run scrape` if touching scraper or data contracts
- [ ] Verified build: `npm run build` and `npm run preview`
- [ ] Added/updated tests if applicable (Vitest/Playwright)
- [ ] Updated `ROADMAP.md` or linked issues with acceptance criteria
